hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah bin ‘Umar that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“People are like a hundred camels; you can hardly find one worth riding among them.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ تُرْجَى لَهُ السَّلاَمَةُ مِنَ الْفِتَنِ
chapter.eng-name: One who hopes for protection from tribulation
